subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: RCA 12-470 RADIO SHACK HACK FILES
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1196188798
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Mike,
 
I wish I could find the older one.  They only have the newer black  model by 
me.  I did pick it up and tested the unit first before I touched  it.  The FM 
reception is awful, almost non-existant.  But the AM did  work good.  If you 
can hack the newer model I would get one but right now  the 12-469 works 
awesome.  Please keep us posted.
 
Jeff
